Detailed Description

EncodingThreadlet is the abstract base class for threadlets which want to encode an image inside a separate thread to avoid a blocked system. The constructor is protected and it is recommended to provide a static factory method in the derived class to create an instance. The methods Threadlet::Fn must be implemented by the derived class.

void EncodingThreadlet::ReleaseInstance (   )  [virtual]
 

Deletes the instance (it's assumed that the threadlet is allocated on the heap). If the threadlet is not allocated on the heap, this method must be reimplemented by the derived class in a proper manner.

See also:
